EmbeddedProjectSample.Name: LEDBlink (no FLASH)
EmbeddedProjectSample.Description: This project demonstrates how to control an LED without programming anything to the SPI FLASH.

PropertyEntry.Name: LED Pin Number
PropertyEntry.Description: Specifies pin number where the LED is connected

PropertyEntry.Name: Delay cycles
PropertyEntry.Description: Specifies the delay (in empty loop cycles) between LED toggling events
